page.description: Search and replace tokens in an expression, useful for replacing fieldnames and subexpressions.
page.syntax: New_Expn as C = TOKEN_SEARCH_REPLACE(C Expression,C SearchToken1,C ReplaceToken1[...,C SearchTokenN,C ReplaceTokenN])

argument.name: Expression
argument.description: The starting expression that contains zero or more instances of the various search arguments.

argument.name: SearchToken1...SearchTokenN
argument.description: SearchN The character strings that you are searching for.

argument.name: ReplaceToken1...ReplaceTokenN
argument.description: ReplaceN The replacement character strings, paired with the search strings.

page.discussion: The TOKEN_SEARCH_REPLACE() function replaces multiple search strings with multiple replace strings.
